Eric’s early working years were spent in Los Angeles and Arizona. He has worked for clients in industries ranging from health care to technology and higher education. Eric’s design has been recognized in both local and national competitions. In 2005, Eric relocated his family in Idaho to escape the Arizona summers, enjoy the outdoors and launch Delorum.

Mark's background is composed of equal parts design and technology. His ability to move between the front and back end of a project ensures that our work not only looks great, but is structurally sound as well. He has a particular interest in the design process, and you can

text.p: Originally from Southeast Idaho, early work experience led Keith to L.A. and branding projects for clients such as Acura and Hughes Electronics (DirecTV, Tivo). Keith returned to the Rexburg area to create a brand development and interactive design firm in semi-rural Idaho. He splits remaining time between community involvement and his family.

Scott’s artistic interests were originally rooted in fine art and illustration, but evolved toward graphic design. Since leaving the dusty plains of West Texas for Rexburg, Scott has worked with clients from food and real estate to communications. Free time is spent in the company of his beautiful new bride.

Steve’s father (a humanities professor) and mother (an artist) instilled a love and capacity for the arts at an early age. Creative and energetic about art and design, Steve thrives on new projects. Most recently, he has shaped packaging, print and web design for clients from golf to software development.

Tyler oversees programming for web development and applications. Tyler’s work experience began at age 12, when he was assigned to learn “the computer” and all things electronic for the family business. After a computer science degree and more than a decade, Tyler joined Delorum in as a full-time developer and part-time nuisance to his wife.

Hailing from Seattle, Richard enjoys cooking, spending time with family and helping expand Delorum’s reach. He joined Delorum in 2007 to improve our bowling stats and streamline our interactions with clients.
